document.full_text: tunisia's main islamist party said on monday delays to a scheduled election date or changes to other plans for a new political order could "drag the country into a spiral of violence."
document.title: tunisian party fears violence if election delayed
lines_and_colors: tunisia's main islamist party said on monday delays to a scheduled election date or changes to other plans for a new political order could "drag the country into a spiral of violence."
